heading: Understand and Control Your Personal Data
intro1: Learn your rights under Somalia’s Data Protection Act.
intro2: The Data Protection Act (No. 005/2023) guarantees everyone key rights to access, correct, or delete their data.

rights.label: Right Not to Be Subject to Automated Decisions

tipsIntro: Protecting your data starts with smart habits.

tips.label: Always check consent before you share data

items.label: File a Complaint
items.desc: Report a concern if you believe your data rights have been violated.

items.label: Register as a Data Controller
items.desc: Begin your legal registration with the DPA as an entity handling data.

items.label: Report a Data Breach
items.desc: Notify the authority about a potential or actual breach of personal data.

items.label: Request Access or Correction
items.desc: Ask to see, correct, or delete your data under the law.
